structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Petition proceedings to request establishment of district.

text.section: When a petition satisfying the requirements of subsection (1) of this section is received by the executive authority, he or she shall forward it to the legislative body which may proceed to enact an ordinance establishing a management district as provided in KRS 91.756.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 3, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 297, sec. 3, effective July 1990.
